mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.type AS "type", a.purchase_amount AS "purchaseAmount", a.stock_amount AS "stockAmount", a.wholesale_amount AS "wholesaleAmount", a.retail_amount AS "retailAmount", a.return_amount AS "returnAmount", a.wholesale_gather_amount AS "wholesaleGatherAmount", a.retail_gather_amount AS "retailGatherAmount", a.gather_amount AS "gatherAmount", a.stock_bill_amount AS "stockBillAmount", a.return_bill_amount AS "returnBillAmount", a.bill_amount AS "billAmount", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag",
createBy.name AS "createBy.name",
updateBy.name AS "updateBy.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user createBy ON createBy.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user updateBy ON updateBy.id = a.update_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO j_financial( id, type, purchase_amount, stock_amount, wholesale_amount, retail_amount, return_amount, wholesale_gather_amount, retail_gather_amount, gather_amount, stock_bill_amount, return_bill_amount, bill_amount, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{type}, #{purchaseAmount}, #{stockAmount}, #{wholesaleAmount}, #{retailAmount}, #{returnAmount}, #{wholesaleGatherAmount}, #{retailGatherAmount}, #{gatherAmount}, #{stockBillAmount}, #{returnBillAmount}, #{billAmount}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE j_financial SET type = #{type}, purchase_amount = #{purchaseAmount}, stock_amount = #{stockAmount}, wholesale_amount = #{wholesaleAmount}, retail_amount = #{retailAmount}, return_amount = #{returnAmount}, wholesale_gather_amount = #{wholesaleGatherAmount}, retail_gather_amount = #{retailGatherAmount}, gather_amount = #{gatherAmount}, stock_bill_amount = #{stockBillAmount}, return_bill_amount = #{returnBillAmount}, bill_amount = #{billAmount}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(o.sum), 0) as purchase_amount FROM j_purchase_order o WHERE o.del_flag = 0 and o.status = 1 AND o.update_date BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate}) a_t, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(o.sum), 0) as stock_amount FROM j_stock_order o WHERE o.del_flag = 0 AND o.status = 1 AND o.update_date BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate}) b_t, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(o.sum), 0) as wholesale_amount FROM j_sale_order o WHERE o.del_flag = 0 AND o.status = 1 AND o.type = 2 AND o.update_date BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate}) c_t, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(o.sum), 0) as retail_amount FROM j_sale_order o WHERE o.del_flag = 0 AND o.status = 1 AND o.type = 1 AND o.update_date BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate}) d_t, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(o.sum), 0) as return_amount FROM j_return_order o WHERE o.del_flag = 0 AND o.status = 1 AND o.update_date BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate}) e_t, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(o.receive_money), 0) as wholesale_gather_amount FROM j_revenue_order o LEFT JOIN j_sale_order s on o.sale_no = s.id WHERE o.del_flag = 0 and o.status = 1 AND s.type = 2 AND o.update_date BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate}) f_t, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(o.receive_money), 0) as retail_gather_amount FROM j_revenue_order o LEFT JOIN j_sale_order s on o.sale_no = s.id WHERE o.del_flag = 0 and o.status = 1 AND s.type = 1 AND o.update_date BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate}) g_t, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(o.receive_money), 0) as gather_amount FROM j_revenue_order o LEFT JOIN j_sale_order s on o.sale_no = s.id WHERE o.del_flag = 0 and o.status = 1 AND o.update_date BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate}) h_t, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(o.pay_money), 0) as stock_bill_amount FROM j_bill_order o WHERE o.del_flag = 0 AND o.status = 1 AND o.update_date BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate}) i_t, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(o.return_money), 0) as return_bill_amount FROM j_return_bill o WHERE o.del_flag = 0 AND o.status = 1 AND o.update_date BETWEEN #{beginDate} AND #{endDate}) j_t
